title: Pipeline Builder
description: I develop user-friendly interfaces that enable businesses to build AI-driven workflows. The platformâ€™s no-code/low-code approach allows users to create data processing pipelines and customizable dashboards, making advanced AI and data analytics accessible to a wide range of users.

title: Crisis Monitoring Dashboard
description: I design a dashboard frontend to monitor crises based on news URLs inputted by users. The system allows for AI-generated crisis monitoring items or manual input by users, providing a flexible and responsive tool for real-time crisis management.

title: PowerPoint Report Generator
description: I create systems that convert data from executive dashboards into ready-made PowerPoint presentations. Using Python and FastAPI, I ensure seamless data transformation and automation, enabling efficient report generation directly from the dashboard.

title: Talent Finder
description: I design interfaces for an AI application that dynamically displays employee information. The frontend captures user input, sends prompts to a Large Language Model (LLM), and retrieves relevant results, providing contextual and efficient data retrieval based on user queries.

title: SmartHome App
description: I contributed to a smart home app that allows user interact to their smart devices, responsible for the frontend and convert the app to iOS app, and deployment to apple app store

title: Life by IFG Web Platform
description: Responsible for driving user adoption and interaction, I optimize sales strategies and craft engaging initiatives for the Life by IFG Web Platform. My goal is to enhance the platform's appeal and ensure a dynamic user experience.

title: Life by IFG on App Store and Google Play Store
description: Contributing to sales and engagement, I enhance the appeal of the Life by IFG app on App Store and Google Play Store. My role involves optimizing sales strategies and fostering user participation for a compelling user experience.

title: Booking PWA
description: As a contributor, I develop a One Stop Booking Solution with Progressive Web App support. Integrated with CRM and Payment Gateway, it's used by renowned brands globally.

title: DPC NX/IS
description: Contributing to the development, I create a Digital Profile Card for online and in-store use. This next-generation solution enhances customer engagement and convenience.

title: Heineken Music Festival Campaign Platform
description: As a lead contributor, I develop a campaign platform for Heineken Laos 2022 Music Festival. This platform enhances engagement and promotes the festival effectively.

title: William Grants and Sons Campaign Platform
description: As a contributor, I develop a platform campaign for William Grants and Sons. The platform effectively promotes the brand's campaign.

title: Booking NX
description: Contributing to the development, I create a one-stop Booking Solution integrated with CRM and Payment Gateway. Widely used by renowned brands worldwide.

title: Booking NX Integration with CRM
description: Leading the integration, I connect Booking NX with CRMXS Feature. This integration enhances functionality and improves user experience.

title: Lazada DPC
description: As a contributor, I develop a Digital Profile Card for Lazada eCommerce. This solution enhances customer engagement and convenience.
